adjective.definition: Relating to or involving the imagination or original ideas, especially in the production of an artistic work.
Having good imagination or original ideas.

noun.definition: The use of the imagination or original ideas, especially in the production of an artistic work; creativity.
noun.example: She was praised for her creativity.

noun.definition: A person whose job involves creative work.
noun.example: The ad agency hired two new creatives.

verb.example: The software allows you to create music.

usage_examples: She has a very creative mind.
The company is looking for creative ways to save money.
